content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) 
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items without required ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
